attributes.action: Free car parking for NHS staff across all trusts in Northern Ireland
attributes.additional_details: The Government took action on the 23 March 2020 to remove car parking charges for NHS staff. This decision is up for review in July. We need to recognise the spirt of the Nation and show our thanks for there relentless 24 hour effort put in by the NHS. No other emergency service charges staff to park at work
attributes.background: NHS staff in Northern Ireland should have free , safe onsite car parking across all trusts.

rejection.details:
Your petition is about something that the Northern Ireland Assembly is responsible for. 

If you'd like to send your petition to the Northern Ireland Assembly, you can find the contact details here:
http://www.niassembly.gov.uk/about-the-assembly/contact-us/
